name: Gallery

unions.name: Msg
unions.comment: A message type for the gallery to update.

unions.name: State
unions.comment: Tracks index, mouse and touch movements

values.name: config
values.comment:
Gallery.config
        { id = "image-gallery"
        , transition = 500 -- time in milliseconds
        , width = Gallery.px 800
        , height = Gallery.px 400
        }
values.type: { id : String.String, transition : Basics.Int, width : Gallery.Length, height : Gallery.Length } -> Gallery.Config

values.name: index
values.comment:
Go to slide at index

    { model | gallery = Gallery.index 10 model.gallery }

values.name: init
values.comment:
Initialize a gallery state

    { gallery = Gallery.init (List.length someSlides) }

values.name: next
values.comment:
Go to next slide

    { model | gallery = Gallery.next model.gallery }

values.name: previous
values.comment:
Go to previous slide

    { model | gallery = Gallery.previous model.gallery }

values.name: update
values.comment:
type Msg
        = GalleryMsg Gallery.Msg

    update : Msg -> Model -> Model
    update msg model =
        case msg of
            GalleryMsg msg ->
                { model | gallery = Gallery.update msg model.gallery }

values.name: view
values.type: Gallery.Config -> Gallery.State -> List.List Gallery.Controls -> List.List ( String.String, Html.Html Gallery.Msg ) -> Html.Html Gallery.Msg

name: Gallery.Image

unions.name: Size
unions.comment: How the image is displayed within it's container, same as CSS background-size

values.name: slide
values.comment: Create an image slide that either fits or covers the gallery container
